title: Adjust mouse appearance in game!
body: The default mouse is very hard to see in combat, especially in high resolution monitors it becomes blur and tiny. My suggest is to give players the ability to adjust mouse size and it's light tone.

replies.body: Mouse cursor modifications are not currently a feature, and unsupported.  I highly advise against trying to make a custom one, as it can be considered creating an unfair advantage in-game.  If you're on 4K, you might get issues like the one you're describing as it's not fully supported yet.  Your best would be to not exceed 1920x1080 resolution on both in-game and native settings.
